alert.note: Alert for Cheboygan; Montmorency; Otsego (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 3:57PM EDT until May 20 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHEBOYGAN...NORTHEASTERN OTSEGO AND NORTHWESTERN MONTMORENCY COUNTIES... At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sparr, or near Gaylord, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Vanderbilt, Hetherton, Sparr, Eastern Corwith Township, Pickerel Lake and Pigeon River State Forest. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
